body: Not all blood sports end in death. It is often costly to train warriors for arenas big and small, and those who finance such enterprises are protective of their investments. In societies that value life but still love the spectacle of a good fracas, fighting to a number of wounds is an excellent compromise. A fight to first blood or to a certain number of wounds is often enough to appease a crowd.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Performance Combat/Types of Performance Combat/To a Number of Wounds
name: To a Number of Wounds
